translation.en: Hmm. Honey, nature's happy sauce.
translation.es: La miel, el jarabe de la felicidad.

translation.en: You can drizzle it, you can pour it,
you can fill a tiny plastic bear with it and squeeze.
translation.es: puedes llenar un osito de plásticocon ella y apretarlo.

translation.en: But what's all the buzz about honey?
translation.es: Pero ¿por qué la miel es tan especial?

translation.en: Yeah, that's what's on the menu today at…
translation.es: Sí, hoy estará en el menú de…

translation.en: [Waffles and Mochi] ♪ Waffles and Mochi's Restaurant! ♪
-[bell chimes] -Oh, hello. Welcome.
Right this way, please. I've got a wonderful table for you.
translation.es: Por aquí, por favor. Tengo una gran mesa.

translation.en: I'm Busy, the maître bee. [laughs]
Okay. A menu for you. [buzzes]
And a napkin. Excellent.
Bon appétit. [chuckles, gasps]
No straws?
Drink up!
Would you like that food to go?
Excellent. I'll just take that for you. [mumbles]
There you are. Ah! Enjoy! [buzzes]
Anybody else?
[sighs] I love my job.
That was the busiest our restaurant has ever been.
translation.es: Hoy vino más gente que nunca.

translation.en: Hey, friends. [all] Hey-o, Mrs. O.
What's cookin'?
I'm gonna go get the rest of your delivery.
translation.es: Traeré el resto de la entrega.

translation.en: Thanks so much, Danny.
Mochi, here you go.
Thank you.
What's in the basket, Mrs. O?
Oh, have I got some great stuff for your dinner menu tonight.
translation.es: Tengo cosas genialespara el menú de esta noche.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Got a little eggplant, some peppers,
-lettuce, and cauliflower. -[Busy gasps]
Did you say cauliflower?
[laughs] Oh, boy.
Ah! Reminds me of when I was just a little bee back on the farm.
translation.es: Me recuerda a cuando erauna abejita en la granja.

translation.en: -They grew cauliflower on the farm? -Oh, yes.
Such wonderful memories of a simpler time. [chuckles]
translation.es: Bellos recuerdos de una época más simple.

translation.en: Oh, wow.
It looks like you guys were pretty busy at the lunch service today.
translation.es: Parece que estuvieron muy ocupadosen el almuerzo.

translation.en: -[Waffles] Yeah. -Sure were.
Oh, you should have seen us, Mrs. O.
Mochi, over here, was boiling and frying!
-[Waffles] Yeah. -Waffles was stirring and whisking.
Danny, you were right by our side the whole time.
translation.es: Danny, nos ayudaste en todo momento.

translation.en: And, Yuki, you were serving up the customers super fast.
translation.es: Y Yuki, serviste todo muy rápido.

translation.en: And Bella was announcing every order.
Like this.
I love that sound.
Anyone else who was super helpful?
Oh! I almost forgot. Yes?
-The real hero of the day… -Oh. [chuckles]
…is Steve.
-[splutters] -He cleaned up all that spaghetti. What? Oh, I was just hungry.
translation.es: - Limpió todos esos espaguetis.- Solo tenía hambre.

translation.en: Oh, there's more on my face.
I… I'll be right back.
-[door locks] -He locked himself in the bathroom.
Was it something we said?
I think it was something you didn't say, Waffles.
translation.es: Fue lo que no dijeron, Waffles.

translation.en: What?
See, everyone was talking about how busy everyone else was
translation.es: Hablaron de lo ocupadosque estuvieron todos,

translation.en: except for Busy.
-Oh, no. I feel awful. -[Danny] Oh.
What should we do?
I think you need to apologize and show him how much you appreciate him.
translation.es: Deben disculparsey mostrarle cuánto lo aprecian.

translation.en: When I wanna show somebody that I appreciate them,
translation.es: Si quiero demostrarle a alguienmi aprecio,

translation.en: I bring them something I know they'll really, really love.
translation.es: le regalo algo que sé que le encantará.

translation.en: [gasps] Like puppies?
-Oh, well, we're talking about Busy. -[Waffles] Oh.
-Oh. Honey! -[Mochi] Mm-hmm.
[all] Yeah!
We should cook something with honey for Busy.
I think that would be a lovely idea.
But we don't know anything about honey.
translation.es: Pero no sabemos nada sobre la miel.

translation.en: Well, the first thing you can do is visit a honey farm.
translation.es: Podrían visitar una granja de miel.

translation.en: -That's a great idea! -[meeps] And I happen to have the card of a great one right here.
translation.es: - ¡Es una gran idea!- Aquí tengo la tarjeta de una muy buena.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Mrs. O.
Glad to be of service.
-I will leave you to it. Good luck. -[chuckles]
[all] Thank you. Bye.
All right, we know what we must do.
translation.es: Muy bien, ya sabemos qué hacer.

translation.en: To the magic cart!
Our food mission, should we choose to eat it,
learn all about honey, so we can make something super delicious to cheer up Busy.
translation.es: Aprender más sobre la mielpara prepararle algo rico a Busy.

translation.en: Look, there's the honey farm!
-Let's go, Mochi. -[meeps]
-Another perfect landing! -[Mochi meeps in agreement]
-Wow! -[meeps]
Look at this honey farm, Mochi.
-There's so many bees here! -[Mochi mimics buzzing]
-Hello. -[beekeepers] Hello.
Hi. Do you know anything about bees?
-Yes. -Yeah, we know a lot about bees.
So get your suits on and come here. -Okay. Come on, Mochi. Let's go. -[Mochi meeps]
translation.es: - Pónganse los trajes y vengan.- Bien. Vamos, Mochi.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hello.
Hello. My name is Waffles, and this is my best friend Mochi.
translation.es: Hola. Me llamo Waffles,y él es mi mejor amigo, Mochi.

translation.en: -I’m Gavin. -And I am Grady.
Gavin and Grady. So, where are we?
We’re at Hapa Honey Farm. Well, we have a little bit of a dilemma.
translation.es: - En la granja de miel Hapa.- Tenemos un pequeño dilema.

translation.en: We wanna cook a meal for our friend Busy. He’s a bee, so we figured we could cook something with honey.
translation.es: Vamos a cocinar para una abeja.Queremos hacer algo con miel.

translation.en: Could you help us find honey?
-Mm-hmm. We'll help you. -Thank you.
[Gavin] When you puff smoke on the bees, it calms them down.
translation.es: El humo calma a las abejas.

translation.en: So what happens inside of a beehive?
[Gavin] In a beehive, there are three types of bees. The queen will be inside, um, laying eggs.
translation.es: Hay tres tipos de abejas.La reina está adentro poniendo huevos.

translation.en: -There are drones. -[Grady] The drones have bigger eyes.
[Gavin] And then the worker bees are out getting pollen and nectar to make honey.
translation.es: Las obreras buscanpolen y néctar para hacer miel.

translation.en: So bees don't just like honey, -they make honey? -Yep.
translation.es: - ¿No solo les gusta, también la fabrican?- Sí.

translation.en: The bees have to work together, and they all have different jobs.
translation.es: Las abejas trabajan juntasy todas tienen distintas tareas.

translation.en: -Just like we do at the restaurant. -[meeps]
[Waffles] So, there’s a queen inside?
[Gavin] Yep, the queen is the big bee who lays all the eggs.
translation.es: Sí, es la abeja grande que pone huevos.

translation.en: Sounds like a busy job. And I’m looking for the queen, which I just found.
translation.es: - Debe estar ocupada.- La acabo de encontrar.

translation.en: -The bee with the white dot is the queen. -[Waffles] Hello. [Grady] My dad marks them with that so we know it's the queen.
translation.es: - Es la abeja con el punto blanco.- Mi papá las marca para reconocerlas.

translation.en: Hello, Your Majesty. [Gavin] Okay, Waffles and Mochi, I'm gonna show what the honey looks like.
translation.es: - Hola, su majestad.- Waffles y Mochi, les mostraré la miel.

translation.en: -[Waffles] Look, Mochi, that’s honey. -[Mochi meeps]
That’s a good question, Mochi.
How can the bees communicate with each other?
The scout bees go out early to look for all the forage, like nectar and pollen.
translation.es: Las abejas pecoreadorassalen temprano a buscar néctar y polen.

translation.en: And they do a little dance in front of the other bees to tell them where they are.
translation.es: Bailan frente a las otraspara decirles dónde están.

translation.en: We love to dance. What kind of dance? It's called a waggle dance.
translation.es: - Amamos bailar.- Es la danza de la abeja.

translation.en: ♪ A waggle dance A waggle dance ♪ ♪ A waggle dance, waggle dance Waga-ga-ga da ♪
So anyways, bees are really hard workers, and they're always busy.
translation.es: Las abejas trabajan muchoy están muy ocupadas.

translation.en: Bees are responsible for about a third of the food that you put in your mouth.
translation.es: Son responsablesde un tercio de lo que comen.

translation.en: A third of the food that we put in our mouth?
-Yeah. -That's a big part of our restaurant. Yeah.
translation.es: - Sí.- Es una gran parte del restaurante.

translation.en: Unbelievable!
Wow. It sounds like bees are super important.
Why don’t you come to our tasting table to pick out honey for your friend?
translation.es: Vengan a elegir miel para su amigo.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheers]
Come on, let’s go. Chase me, Mochi!
-Wow, look at all these jars of honey. -[Mochi meeps]
translation.es: Vaya, mira todos esos frascos de miel.

translation.en: What is honey made from?
Honey, we call it bee barf.
-"Bee barf?" -[meeps]
-So, a bee gets nectar from a flower… -[Waffles] Mm-hmm. …and then spits it into another bee’s mouth,
translation.es: La abeja toma néctar de una flory lo escupe en la boca de otra abeja.

translation.en: and that bee spits it into another bee's mouth, and it continues on for a while.
translation.es: Esa lo escupe en la boca de otra,y así sucesivamente.

translation.en: -[groans] -[Gavin] And it slowly becomes honey, and they eventually put it into comb.
translation.es: Y lentamente se convierteen la miel que ponen en el panal.

translation.en: Depending on where the bees go to forage makes different kinds of honey.
translation.es: Según el lugar de pecoreo,crean distintos tipos de miel.

translation.en: So if it’s orange blossom honey, the bees are in a great big field of oranges.
translation.es: Si es miel de azahar, las abejasestán en un gran campo de naranjos.

translation.en: And we have a forest honey, which is the sap that leaks out of the trees,
translation.es: Tenemos miel del bosque, que esla savia que se filtra de los árboles.

translation.en: and then aphids and other bugs eat the sticky, sweet sap.
translation.es: Los pulgones y otros insectoscomen la savia dulce y pegajosa.

translation.en: -They poop out the sugar. -[yelps]
-[man] Yeah. -Is poo-poo honey?
Then the bees take it back to their hive, and they barf into each other's mouth, and then it becomes forest honey.
translation.es: Las abejas la llevan a su colmena,vomitan, y se forma la miel del bosque.

translation.en: [Waffles] But where is your sense of adventure?
I would love to try it.
You can.
Hello, honey.
-It's delicious. -[Mochi] Mm.
-Do you like it, Mochi? -Mmm. [meeps]
Forest honey is also one of the most nutritious honey there is.
translation.es: La miel de bosquees de las más nutritivas.

translation.en: Forest honey is even more amazing than regular honey.
translation.es: Es aún más asombrosa que la miel común.

translation.en: Yeah.
I can taste the nutrition.
Or am I tasting the poop?
-Poop. You're tasting the poop. -The nutrition. Nutrition.
Well, we have the honey. But how do we decide what to make with it?
Maybe let’s go talk to a chef.
-A chef. Yeah. -[both laugh]
-[phone rings] -Oh. Sorry, gotta take this.
-[Mochi meeps] -Hello.
How's it going, you two? Good. We have honey. We're about to talk to a chef.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tal?- Tenemos miel y veremos a un chef.

translation.en: Great! Things are getting a little better here. Busy stopped crying.
translation.es: Genial. Todo está mejor.Busy dejó de llorar.

translation.en: [Busy] No. I was just taking a little break!
-You two better hurry. -We will.
Okay, Moch, let's learn how to cook with honey.
translation.es: Bien, Moch. Aprendamos a cocinar con miel.

translation.en: -Are you guys in line for the bathroom? -[Busy gasps] I'm in here, Steven!
translation.es: ¿Hacen fila para el baño? ¡Estoy yo aquí, Steven!

translation.en: -Oh. -I'll ju… I'll just use another one.
Hi. Hi. -How are you? -Hi, guys.
Chef Samin. What are you doing here?
Oh, I'm making a delicious thing called honey confetti.
translation.es: Preparo algo deliciosollamado confeti de miel.

translation.en: -Wanna help? Okay. -[Waffles] Yeah!
So, we’re gonna put all sorts of delicious seeds in the honey, and you can drizzle it on top of almost any dish.
translation.es: Mezclaremos unas ricas semillas con miel.Se puede usar en casi cualquier plato.

translation.en: -Will you help mix the seed mixture? -Sure.
translation.es: ¿Mezclan las semillas? Aquí hay semillas tostadasde sésamo amarillo,

translation.en: [Samin] Okay, here’s some toasted yellow sesame seeds.
translation.es: Aquí hay semillas tostadasde sésamo amarillo,

translation.en: Here's some toasted pumpkin seeds, toasted poppy seeds.
This is black sesame.
And this is the sunflower. You can add all of those into there.
translation.es: Y esto es girasol.Pueden agregar todo eso.

translation.en: And now, there’s just one ingredient left to add.
-Honey. -Honey! Who's gonna help?
-Me. -Me.
-Let’s add this whole jar. -[Grady] Whoa!
[Samin] Now, we’re gonna make our dish.
translation.es: Prepararemos el plato.Estos son camotes o batatas.

translation.en: -These are some sweet potatoes. -[Waffles] Oh, that color.
translation.es: Prepararemos el plato.Estos son camotes o batatas. - Qué color.- ¿No están lindos?

translation.en: [Samin] Aren’t they so pretty?
And then we’re gonna do our honey confetti.
-[kids] Mmm! -Confetti, confetti, confetti!
[Samin] And these are marigolds.
Everyone ready to taste some sweet potato?
-Yeah. -Yeah! Okay.
Wait a minute. Samin, there's flowers on this. 'Course, there are flowers. They're edible.
translation.es: - Pero, Samin, esto tiene flores.- Claro, son comestibles.

translation.en: The flowers aren't edible. Some flowers are edible.
translation.es: - Las flores no se comen.- Algunas sí.

translation.en: We eat flowers all the time.
-Mm? -Things like broccoli.
[screams] Broccoli is a flower?
-Artichokes. -[meeps] And cauliflower.
translation.es: O la alcachofa y la coliflor.

translation.en: Cauliflower is a… flower?
You’re right, Mochi!
Busy said cauliflower was his favorite thing when he was a little bee.
translation.es: Busy dijo que le encantaba la coliflor.

translation.en: You can make this dish with cauliflower instead of sweet potatoes.
translation.es: Puedes hacer este mismo platocon coliflor.

translation.en: I’m sorry, Samin, we gotta go and get cooking. Go get cookin'!
Come on, Mochi!
-[all] Bye. -Come on, we gotta go!
-Mochi, are you ready to get cooking? -[meeps excitedly]
All right, time for Waffle speed!
translation.es: Muy bien. ¡Iré a la velocidad de Waffle!

translation.en: -Aprons on! -[Mochi] Mm-hmm. -Strings tied! -[Mochi meeps]
-Hats on! Let’s go! -[meeps excitedly]
♪ It’s time to hit the kitchen ♪ ♪ And complete our mission ♪
translation.es: Es hora de cocinary completar la misión.

translation.en: [all] ♪ What’s cookin'? What’s cookin'? ♪
♪ Let’s make a special dish That’s tasty and delish! ♪
[all] ♪ What’s cookin'? What’s cookin'? ♪
-[Mochi flutters lips] Mm? -Hey, Moch. Are you ready to make confetti honey cauliflower?
translation.es: Moch, ¿listo para hacer coliflor con miel?

translation.en: -[meeps] -All right, let's go.
-[all] ♪ One ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Slice a cauliflower ♪ ♪ Brush it with oil and roast it ♪
-[all] ♪ Two ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Toast the seeds ♪
translation.es: - ¡Dos!- Tuesta las semillas y añade miel.

translation.en: -♪ And mix them with honey ♪ -[all] ♪ Three ♪
translation.es: - ¡Dos!- Tuesta las semillas y añade miel. - ¡Tres!- Ponla en un colchón de yogur.

translation.en: [Waffles] ♪ Plate it up On a bed of yogurt ♪
translation.es: - ¡Tres!- Ponla en un colchón de yogur.

translation.en: -[all] ♪ Four ♪ -[Waffles] ♪ Drizzle the honey confetti ♪
translation.es: - ¡Cuatro!- Rocía la miel y agrega flores.

translation.en: ♪ And add some flowers ♪
translation.es: - ¡Cuatro!- Rocía la miel y agrega flores. Y ahí lo tienen:¡coliflor con confeti de miel!

translation.en: ♪ And there you have it, it’s confetti honey cauliflower! ♪
translation.es: Y ahí lo tienen:¡coliflor con confeti de miel!

translation.en: -[all] ♪ Honey cauliflower ♪ -[bell dings]
Order up.
Do… Do you whiff what I whiff?
What is that enchanting smell?
It's this!
What's going on here?
[chuckles] A fresh floral bouquet?
Cooked cauliflower, like, back on the farm?
translation.es: Coliflor cocida como en la granja.

translation.en: Drizzled with… [gasps] …confetti honey?
I feel so loved.
[screams] It's delicious!
-[all] Hurray! -[Busy laughs]
Today, Mochi and I found out that honey wouldn’t exist without bees.
translation.es: Hoy aprendimosque la miel no existiría sin las abejas.

translation.en: They work so hard making it. Just like you do here at the restaurant.
translation.es: Trabajan mucho para hacerla,como tú en el restaurante.

translation.en: Oh, we appreciate you, Busy, and we’re sorry.
translation.es: Te apreciamos mucho, Busy, y lo sentimos.

translation.en: That’s the sweetest thing anyone has ever said to me.
translation.es: Es lo más dulce que me han dicho. Y ahora, quiero que sepanlo importantes que son para mí.

translation.en: And now, I would like to say how much you all mean to me.
translation.es: Y ahora, quiero que sepanlo importantes que son para mí.

translation.en: Ooh, Busy’s gonna give us a speech.
No, Danny. Bees communicate through the power of dance.
translation.es: No, Danny.Las abejas se comunican bailando.

translation.en: -Huh? -Hit it!
-[Yuki] Okay. All right. -[Mochi giggles]
Yeah, Busy, okay. -Shake what your queen gave you. -Yeah!
translation.es: ¡Sí, Busy! ¡Muy bien!Mueve lo que te dio tu reina.

translation.en: Come on, shake your stingers, everybody! [grunts]
-[all] Go, Busy. Go, Busy. -That's right. Come on.
-Show me what you got! -[all] Go, Busy!
